Headline: Purple Line Service Delayed near South Blvd
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are standing near South Blvd due to debris on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are standing near South Blvd due to debris on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

Shuttle buses are available between Howard and Linden to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
